cheritan.desc: Cheritan Farmhouse, tucked away in the peaceful middle of the forest, provides a dreamlike haven from the bustling city life. Our farmhouse is set up to provide a perfect balance of leisure and enjoyment, guaranteeing you and your loved ones a memorable stay. Special features of Cheritan Farmhouse include a wonderful garden area, a cool swimming pool, a fully stocked kitchen with dishes and bowls, and a barbeque area for delicious meals. A 43-inch TV, WiFi, a Bluetooth audio system, and access to Netflix, Prime, Hotstar, Aha, and ZEE5 provide plenty of entertainment options. Play games like chess, carroms, shuttle, cricket, and shuttle to make sure everyone has a good time.
cheritan.subdesc: Over the last several decades, urban investors have developed an interest in purchasing rural acreage and converting it into holiday homes or lavish resorts with plenty of greenery and scenic views. Since the vertical rise of structures in urban centres leaves little room for greenery and open space, demand for such housing choices has surged. As a result, individuals have begun investing actively in property in distant places. A farmhouse is one of these housing types since it enables the investor to possess both property and privacy.

sakethavanam.desc: TRADITIONALLY FARMHOUSES are simply homes built on agricultural lands to house and protect who owned or worked the land. The term Farmhouse isn't necessarily connected to a particular style identified by a fixed set of features, but a setting for a way of life. This is most likely why its appeal seems to be timeless.
sakethavanam.subdesc: Over the last several decades, urban investors have developed an interest in purchasing rural acreage and converting it into holiday homes or lavish resorts with plenty of greenery and scenic views. Since the vertical rise of structures in urban centres leaves little room for greenery and open space, demand for such housing choices has surged. As a result, individuals have begun investing actively in property in distant places. A farmhouse is one of these housing types since it enables the investor to possess both property and privacy.

psr-farmhouse.desc: Dozzy showcases some of the best farmhouses in Hyderabad, ideal for peaceful retreats. One of our premier properties, PSR FARM Stays, is nestled in lush greenery and offers a serene escape. With a delightful swimming pool, it’s perfect for cooling off and spending quality time with loved ones.
psr-farmhouse.subdesc: Rooms are well-furnished with king-size beds, air conditioning, and essential amenities to ensure your comfort. Additional features like TVs and fridges provide convenience during your stay. For a special touch, take advantage of the BBQ setup and enjoy an evening of outdoor dining and stargazing.

v-farmhouse.desc: Dozzy brings you some of the most exquisite farmhouses in Hyderabad, offering tranquil spaces for a relaxing escape. v-farmhouse.subdesc: The farmhouse features rooms designed for ultimate comfort, with king-size beds, air conditioning, and other essential amenities. Evenings get better with a BBQ setup and bonfire pit, offering a fun and unforgettable outdoor dining experience beneath the stars.

With its serene surroundings, cozy interiors, and excellent amenities, NK FARMHOUSE_Dozzy_1569 Farmhouse is an ideal retreat near Hyderabad for relaxation, celebrations, or reconnecting with nature.

The farmhouse is equipped with all the necessary comforts, including well-appointed rooms with air conditioning, cozy double beds, a flat-screen TV, a mini-fridge, and plenty of storage space, ensuring a stress-free and restful stay.

asn-farmhouse.desc: ASN Farm Farmhouse offers an inviting retreat just outside Hyderabad, where you can enjoy a perfect blend of relaxation and adventure. Surrounded by scenic landscapes and lush greenery, it’s a haven for those who seek both peace and exploration, making it an ideal destination for families, friends, or corporate getaways.

Inside, the rooms are designed for ultimate comfort, featuring modern amenities such as air conditioning, king-size beds, LED televisions, mini-fridges, and ample closet space, ensuring a delightful and memorable stay for everyone.

Whether you're here for a short break or a weekend getaway, BGY Farmhouse provides the ideal environment to connect with nature and rejuvenate.
